title: EntitySetTarget
description: This document describes the metadata properties available when mapping an EntitySet to a control. Typically the controls that make use of this definition display some sort of list to the user.

DisplayValue.description: The property of the value to display to the user. If not specified, the ReturnValue will be used.

ReturnValue.description: The property of the value to return on selection.

Target.description: The target entity set to get the values from.
